header.name: Bella(JiEun Kim)
home.title: Software Engineer at 3+ years of experience in full-stack development, and project development lead dedicated to building reliable, scalable products. Specialized in JavaScript, Node.js, React.js, MongoDB to create impactful and user-centric web applications.
home.techStack.title: TECHNICAL SKILLS
home.featuredProjects.title: FEATURED PROJECTS
projects.1.name: E-commerce Platform
projects.1.description: A full-featured e-commerce site with product catalogs, user authentication, and a secure payment gateway. Built with a focus on performance and user experience.
projects.2.name: Data Visualization Dashboard
projects.2.description: An interactive dashboard for visualizing complex datasets. Features dynamic charts and filters to help users gain insights from their data.
projects.3.name: Mobile Fitness App
projects.3.description: A cross-platform mobile application for tracking workouts and fitness goals. Includes real-time progress monitoring and social sharing features.
about.title: My Philosophy
about.paragraph: I find my greatest satisfaction in leveraging technology to solve business problems and deliver tangible value to users. I strive to go beyond mere feature implementation, focusing instead on designing scalable, stable architectures and conducting in-depth analysis to resolve the root causes of issues that impede the user experience. I firmly believe that collaborative growth and knowledge sharing are essential to a team's success, and I aim to contribute by using my technical leadership and clear communication to unlock the team's full potential.
